223508950.body:
$CJJD 

- They have 108 Million dollars in revenue with a market cap currently at 71 Million Dollars. 

- They have been in business for over 11 years and their online business has just started to really show great signs of growth. 

- Nearly every company in the world has had less in person traffic due to corona. Does CJJD saying this really warrant a 25% drop in minutes?

- The had an offering at $2 for $10 Million dollars of proceeds with warrants at $2.60. Did someone really throw $10 million at them without knowing what the future holds? 

- The haven’t traded under $1 since December of 2012, almost 0 chance it falls below $1

223508806.body:
$CJJD after much research and further analysis IMO this is a tactic to get insiders the best buy in price before releasing earnings ,  and get rid of any non long term investors the reason i came to this conclusion is .
1. the direct offering of 2 with exercise at 2.6
2. the steady up stepping the chart shows consolidation and strong support 
3. There is no value in a negative unofficial statement when postponing earnings
4. Sabby is still holding 5% of jojo (why hold) why not sell off all together?
5. The sales from the previous outbreak have had time to accumulate and effect ER. Toppled with the fact that the second outbreak occurred shortly thereafter.

223502204.body: $CJJD  part 2-    was this manipulated along the way by the MM's? ABSOLUTELY! But, i personally think it was actually a good thing for the stock in the long run. When you view the 1 year chart you can see that it was stair stepped in a rather healthy way from june 1st to current. Yes they gained a ton of shares along the way and made millions I'm sure but you and I had the opp to do the same thing if patient and playing it the same way. A lot of people think it couldnt break the 2.00 mark and that is a red flag, but it wasnt actually the 2.00 mark that was the resistance, it was the 100 day moving average that it was trying to break at 1.92 but the shorter moving averages hadnt caught up enough yet to support it going higher. For at least the runup to 2.00, i believe the MM's will continue to stair step this in a way that will allow the moving averages to catch up properly while they continue to make millions along the way. (continued)

223501438.body: $CJJD  Part 3- But WE can follow their lead and make those gains as well. You cant beat the MM's and Tutes but you can learn from them. If you have the time and patience this stock in its current situation is a big money maker. Between the currently due ER and the closely following ER after, this absolutely has the promise of 3.50 - 5.00 if not much more. As far as the theories on why they announced poor walk in numbers at stores.... i dont think it really matters in the big picture but i do agree that it may have been scare tactics to some degree. doesnt make a lot of sense to unnecessarily bring a gloomy outlook unless youre doing it in an official ER where it would be required of you to give full disclosure. We can look at what happened yesterday as a setback or we can look at it as another runup opportunity to make more gains and accumulate more shares BEFORE it even breaks the 2.00 mark and really starts to move because thats where the DO was and thats truly the FLOOR (continued)

223498813.body: $CJJD  PART 1 - I've been in on CJJD since june 2nd and have literally been watching it solely ALL DAY EVERY DAY so I feel somewhat qualified to speak about its movements thru that period and so I'll give my 2 cents this one time and then I'm back to my same game plan as before.  First off, you have to do what you feel is best for your personal situation, no one else has to live with the results of your trade decisions so don't listen to random comments and base your decision off of others emotions. I entered Jo-Jo at 1.37 with the plan of swinging to 2.45 to fill the gap, and along the way taking the opportunities to sell on over pumps and rebuying on dips to major support levels to accumulate shares. Even though the DO price is 2.00 the PPS wasn't just going to fly straight up there without pause, the moving averages still need time to catch up at certain levels to provide support before legging up again, giving several opp's to accumulate "free shares" along the way.   (continued)

223497261.body: $SHIP $CJJD $DMPI $TOPS $ZOM NEWBIES READ THIS. I am also a newbie. GET OFF THESE MESSAGE BOARDS!!!! Learn how to do your own research and due diligence. If you base your trades on what you read on these boards, you will fail. I was doing great until I joined ST. No excuses, I'm a grown man, I own my mistakes. There might be 10% on here who are legit traders with solid info. The rest have an agenda. Some, and sometimes a lot, of those on here are paid stock pumpers who dont even own that particular stock. When you read "this is about to blast off" or "I just loaded up 10,000 more shares" , man dont believe that crap. I cashed in every one of my positions yesterday so i can take a couple weeks to study chart reading, chart set up, chart indicators etc etc. When i resume, i will be more informed. If you/we cant do our own DD, we have no business trading stocks. Take my word, all stock message boards, not just ST, are infested with stock pumpers. LEARN TO DO YOUR OWN DD. Good luck

Online growth stats up up I think (weak till March cause wholesale online feed stores which were impacted by covid) 10 new stores also opened before march end, good for later filing. Depth of detail in filings, again, is A+. Let them play the, possibly, 90-99 cent naz delist threat...may add then. Ugly market here. I do not reccomend  new adds for min. 10 sessions. Then under a buck grab if risk tolerance allows. Pondering building bigger year end hold later...Aug maybe. Nothing big before. Gotta go. Good comments, wish I could interject but limited time. GL and peace to all!
